# uptimekuma_monitor_docker (Data Source)

Get Docker monitor information by ID or name

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Example: Read Docker monitor by name
data "uptimekuma_monitor_docker" "example" {
  name = "Redis Container"
}

# Example: Read Docker monitor by ID
data "uptimekuma_monitor_docker" "by_id" {
  id = 1
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (Number) Monitor identifier
- `name` (String) Monitor name

### Read-Only

- `docker_container` (String) Docker container name or ID
- `docker_host_id` (Number) Docker host ID
